scripts.dev: concurrently -n FE,DB,MOBILE "pnpm --filter next dev" "pnpm --filter @rally/db dev" "pnpm --filter mobile dev"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently -n FE,DB,MOBILE "pnpm --filter next dev" "pnpm --filter @rally/db dev" "pnpm --filter mobile dev"
scripts.build: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter next build && pnpm --filter mobile build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @rally/db build && pnpm --filter @rally/api build && pnpm --filter @rally/api-client build
scripts.clean: pnpm --recursive exec rm -rf node_modules dist .next .expo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:install: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm build:packages
